_header: The flower of our garland is down fall

Ghent317.Transcription:
þe flour of hour gerland es doun fallehour Ioye es bytterrer
                    þen es any galleAllas wat vs es wofor hour Ioy es or goLat
                    neuyr for hus þing nobellefor hour [ ]o[ ]es þay heryin in
                    helle
Ghent317.Note:
Preceded by 6288; text
                    badly worn and dirty (verso of last folio in MS), esp. at outer edge; written
                    above this is ‘[ ] mulier [ ] adulterii & suppenderunt
                        sedenocte & scriptum fuit super capita eorum’.
Ghent317.Editions:
Logeman,  Henri. 
             “Miscellen aus einer Ghenten handschrift.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         87 (1891): 431-2: 432.
